languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас кланяется.{/n} "Согласно сообщению, которое мне передали несколько минут назад, губернатор Драйвстем прибыл ко двору. Полагаю, госпожа канцлер уже готова организовать встречу — достаточно уведомить ее, что вы готовы принять Урбенда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас кланяется.{/n} "Согласно сообщению, которое мне передали несколько минут назад, губернатор Драйвстем прибыл ко двору. Полагаю, госпожа канцлер уже готова организовать встречу — достаточно уведомить ее, что вы готовы принять Урбендта".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас кланяется.{/n} "Согласно сообщению, которое мне передали несколько минут назад, губернатор Драйвстем прибыл ко двору. Полагаю, госпожа канцлер уже готова организовать встречу — достаточно уведомить ее, что вы готовы принять Урбенда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I've received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at the court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you're ready to see Urbend."

{n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I've received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at the court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you're ready to see Urbend."

{n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

{n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

{n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯鞠了一躬。{/n}“根据我几分钟前收到的消息，德莱夫斯塔总督已经抵达宫廷。我想，宰相已经准备好安排会面了。接下来的事情就是通知她，说您已经准备好与厄本见面了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯鞠了一躬。{/n}“根据我几分钟前收到的消息，德莱夫斯塔总督已经抵达宫廷。我想，宰相已经准备好安排会面了。接下来的事情就是通知她，说您已经准备好与厄本见面了。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Hace unos minutos he recibido un mensaje según el que el gobernador Drivestem ha aparecido en la corte. Imagino que la canciller ya está lista para organizar la reunión. Solo queda que le informe de que quiere ver a Urbend».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Hace unos minutos he recibido un mensaje según el que el gobernador Drivestem ha aparecido en la corte. Imagino que la canciller ya está lista para organizar la reunión. Solo queda que le informe de que quiere ver a Urbend».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは一礼をする。{/n}「数分前に受信したメッセージによると、ドライブステム総督が王宮に到着したとのこと。議長がすでに面会の手配をしているかと存じます。あとは陛下がアーベントに会う用意ができていると、彼女に伝えるだけですね」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは一礼をする。{/n}「数分前に受信したメッセージによると、ドライブステム総督が王宮に到着したとのこと。議長がすでに面会の手配をしているかと存じます。あとは陛下がアーベントに会う用意ができていると、彼女に伝えるだけですね」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas verbeugt sich.{/n} "Laut der Nachricht, die ich vor wenigen Minuten erhielt, ist Gouverneur Drivestem am Hofe eingetroffen. Die Kanzlerin ist bestimmt bereits auf das Treffen vorbereitet – Ihr müsst sie nur noch benachrichtigen, dass Ihr Urbend nun sehen wollt."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas verbeugt sich.{/n} "Laut der Nachricht, die ich vor wenigen Minuten erhielt, ist Gouverneur Drivestem am Hofe eingetroffen. Die Kanzlerin ist bestimmt bereits auf das Treffen vorbereitet – Ihr müsst sie nur noch benachrichtigen, dass Ihr Urbend nun sehen wollt."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas s'incline.{/n} « D'après le message que j'ai reçu il y a quelques minutes, le gouverneur Drivestem est arrivé. La chancelière est sûrement déjà prête à organiser la rencontre, il vous suffira de l'informer quand vous voudrez voir Urbend. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas s'incline.{/n} « D'après le message que j'ai reçu il y a quelques minutes, le gouverneur Drivestem est arrivé. La chancelière est sûrement déjà prête à organiser la rencontre, il vous suffira de l'informer quand vous voudrez voir Urbend. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas eğiliyor.{/n} "Birkaç dakika önce aldığım mesaja göre Vali Drivestem saraya ulaşmış. Şansölye, toplantıyı ayarlamak için çoktan hazırlanmıştır diye tahmin ediyorum. Tek yapmanız gereken, Urbend'i görmeye hazır olduğunuzu kendisine haber vermek."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas bows.{/n} "According to the message I received a few minutes ago, Governor Drivestem has arrived at court. I imagine that the chancellor is already prepared to arrange the meeting — all that's left is to notify her that you are ready to see Urbend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas eğiliyor.{/n} "Birkaç dakika önce aldığım mesaja göre Vali Drivestem saraya ulaşmış. Şansölye toplantıyı ayarlamak için hazırlanmıştır bile diye tahmin ediyorum. Tek yapmanız gereken Urbend'i görmeye hazır olduğunuz konusunda onu bilgilendirmek."
